description:
Abe is an 18-year-old straight guy with blond hair and pretty blue eyes.
He will be starting his freshman year at college this fall and will be studying "something in business."
He's one of those skinny guys with a big dick.
"I saw my dad in the shower once," he offered. "He was hung like a horse. Maybe I got some of that."
Abe has a girlfriend who is out of the country, but will be back soon.
"I can't wait," he said with a grin.
title: Abe
